channel.title: Please help | client background
channel.description:
First of all , if this topic doesn't belong here PLEASE do not warn me or somthing , im really new and im bad at english I only now how to rite and dont now how to read well and i didnt found any rules against this thing.
Can some 1 plaease help me DESIGN a client background? if yes plz pm me!!

item.title: Please help | client background
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Section Rules

[ul][li]Topics related to the modification of a client’s background are not welcome.[/li][/ul]

You simply get an image, set it to the size 765x503 and then flip the right side horizontally.

Read full topic
